templates.title: Flame
templates.name: flame
templates.description: Flame is a self-hosted startpage for your server. Its design is heavily inspired by SUI. Flame is user-friendly and easy to set up. With its built-in editors, users can quickly establish their own application hub without any file editing.
templates.note: Flame is a self-hosted startpage for your server. Manage your apps and bookmarks effortlessly with built-in editors.

env.name: PASSWORD
env.label: PASSWORD
env.description: Specifies the password to be used by the Flame application
